summary: BuildRequest contains no requirements or acceptance criteria, but the diff introduces substantial new backend functionality (product catalog endpoints and access control) and updates project_state metadata with a deployment request not present in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced an access control/authorization system initialization and admin permission checks (e.g., for seeding products and adding products).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so adding authorization/access-control behavior is not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Implemented a product catalog backend (Product/ProductInput types, in-memory product store, seeding sample products, listing/searching/sorting products, and adding products).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so adding product store functionality is not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project_state.json to describe a pending feature request to deploy 'App draft Version 16' live.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly lists 'Requirements: none'; this deployment request is not part of the provided BuildRequest content.
